name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Around 10 pm on March 18, the Zhongshan Second Bridge in Zhongshan, Guangdong, sank and is currently closed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a poisoning incident occurred in the water resources laboratory of the Hydrological Resources Survey Bureau of Enshi Prefecture, Hubei Province, where a woman put an unknown substance into her colleague's water cup. 
A staff member of the Hubei Hydrological Resources Center responded to reporters that they were waiting for the results of the public security investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Zhongshan Municipal People's Government website shows that in October 2022, the Zhongshan Municipal Development and Reform Bureau issued a document approving the reinforcement of the Zhongshan Second Bridge project, with a total investment of 89.83 million yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 18, Douyin released a statement of punishment against the anchor.
The statement said that the anchor made misleading edits to the video he released to the public and erased part of the dialogue. At the same time, the 731 Exhibition Hall has clearly stated that live broadcasts in the exhibition hall are prohibited.
In addition, the anchor has broadcast 16 live broadcasts in front of the 731 Crime Evidence Exhibition Hall since January and has been reported 146 times for "using netizens' patriotic feelings to attract attention." At the same time, there are also cases of shouting outside the exhibition hall, which has a bad influence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 18, the media revealed another bullying incident at Zhubao Middle School in Yitang Town, Lanshan District, Linyi City, Shandong Province. In a 7-minute video, a teenager was beaten with tree branches by several people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the police said that all the attackers have been arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @BirdieW53745 Do you online commentators have no conscience at all?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on March 19, a black car hit students at Taizhou Vocational and Technical College, causing multiple injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/q7natn54vM

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of March 18, a junior high school student was stabbed to death outside Xianning Railway Station. The cause of the incident was said to be a dispute with a classmate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Media reports said that a 13-year-old boy sexually assaulted an 8-year-old girl in Qingyuan, Guangdong on February 26.
On March 18, the Qingyuan police informed the victim's family that since the boy was under 14 years old, he could not be held criminally responsible, so no case would be filed. The boy has now returned to school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 19, Article 23 of the Hong Kong Basic Law was passed unanimously

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 18, the police in Feixiang District, Handan, Hebei Province, said in an interview regarding the murder of a local junior high school student that the autopsy has been completed and the victim's body was buried in a pit 56 centimeters deep, not 2 meters as previously rumored.
No adult has been found to have committed the crime. The suspect had premeditated the crime and had dug once the day before the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At around 7:00 on March 19, a traffic accident occurred near Lingkong 2nd Street, Tiexi District, Shenyang City, Liaoning Province. A black car crashed into the opposite sidewalk, killing one person and injuring four others.
The four injured were sent to the nearest hospital for emergency treatment, and two of them died after rescue efforts failed. So far, the accident has caused 3 deaths and 2 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 18, Xi'an, Shaanxi.
A student from Xi'an No. 19 Middle School died in a car accident at the school gate. No one from the school or the Education Bureau took up the case. On that day, the family held the child's portrait outside the school to defend their rights.
During the period, a family member fainted due to excessive grief, and the principal was also lying on a stretcher. Passersby accused the principal of "pretending to be dead" after being touched by an old man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 18, school bullying incidents broke out in many places
A teenager from Linzhang County No. 2 Middle School kicked, hit with bricks, and whipped a teenager who fell to the ground in a wheat field. The beaten teenager protected his face with his hands and moaned for mercy.
Jieyang, Guangdong. A little girl was surrounded by a group of boys of the same age in a corner. Many people took turns to bully her, whipping her with ropes and kicking her.
A junior high school student in Mei County, Baoji, Shaanxi was slapped by many people. The staff of Mei County Education and Sports Bureau responded that the police have intervened
A boy was beaten by two classmates in the toilet of Experimental Middle School in Laiwu District, Jinan, Shandong. The video shows that he was pulled by the hair and kicked. The boy knelt on the ground and trembled, and more than a dozen classmates watched and cheered.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 8 pm on March 19, at Jiaodaokou, Dongcheng District, Beijing, a black car rushed into the non-motorized vehicle lane and hit pedestrians, leaving a mess at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After hitting someone, the driver stood in the car and cursed at the people around him. The driver was suspected of drunk driving, and someone in the video said "he smelled so much alcohol."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/fTNpKt5lIh

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 19, at Guangzhou Jingxi Southern Hospital, a man slashed with a sickle on the roadside and then fled on a shared bicycle.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CCTV News released a notice
A small passenger car collided with several electric vehicles at the Kuanjie intersection. The driver has been controlled and the injured have been sent to the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The surveillance video shows that the vehicle involved in the accident had collided with another car before the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The accident has so far caused 3 deaths and 16 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/1AlGcxPt8j

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, everyone should have seen that a large number of robot accounts have appeared under each of my tweets to attack me. I believe some friends should have received their private messages. In fact, for a long time, I have received hundreds of various attacks and pollution of my mailbox every day. But nothing has changed. I am still here every day to report on the social events happening in China. At the same time, I also thank all the people in China. Even though there have been all kinds of rumors and slanders, even though there are risks, everyone still continues to submit their experiences to me every day.
I have always positioned myself as a journalist, to tell people inside the wall what is happening around them. But obviously the blow I have suffered is extremely exaggerated, both in reality and on the Internet.
This just proves that the power of news is so great that it makes a little person who has strayed into history become such a terrifying monster in their eyes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Of course, not to mention cyber attacks.
